all: We do not have any stats for this player.

bio: 1990- Third Round at Japan Open (as qualifier).
1989- Quarterfinalist at Brisbane Ch.; Doubles Semifinalist at Croydon Ch.
(w/Pedersen); Runner-up at Japanese Sat. (w/35 ATP pts.).
Played at Foothill Junior College (w/Brad Gilbert, Paul Chamberlin) in
1980-81. He transferred to the University of Utah in 1982-83 where he was a
teammate of Greg Holmes. Both qualified for the NCAA Championships (Holmes
